form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL Examination of Applicants for United States Visas

full_text: Screened by NARA, 4/18/2023 PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS Tijuana, B. Calif. FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION May 29, 1987 CITY COUNTRY At request of the American Consul at Tijuana, B. Calif. Mexico NAME AGE SEX Zacarias Ortega Magdaleno 71 M I certify that on the above date I examined WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON Mex P 3079 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis. infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. Married, 11 children, ages 20 to 43 (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below. revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability. or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity. as follows (give class-A, B, or C-diagnosis, and pertinent details*): Class C: 1. Exploratory laparotomy scar 2. Bilateral inguinal hernioplasty scar 14"x17" Date: 5-29-87 # RS 25036 Within normal limits Chest X-ray report Francisco Sanchez M., M.D. from Dr. Blood serological report non-reactive VDRL 5-29-87 from DrLab, Blancarte, Ti juana Other special report(s) (when needed) Francisco Sanchez M., M.D. from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICALTECHNICALA ADVISOR TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT MEDICAL EXAMINER 5-29-87 50157-102 *Continue on reverse side if necessary. OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Rev. 5-78) GPO : 1985 O - 479-003 Dept. of State
